title: Android app download ranges worldwide 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of apps for 14 number of Number of downloadss.
The Share of apps is appeared to be the highest at Number of downloads 100-500 and lowest at Number of downloads 5000000+.
The highest Number of downloads 100-500 has 21.02 more Share of apps than the lowest Number of downloads 5000000+.
min_summary: This bar chart has 14 columns on the x axis representing Number of downloads, and Share of apps in each Number of downloads on the y axis.
The maximum Share of apps 21.12 is found at Number of downloads 100-500 and the minimum is found at 5000000+ where Number of downloads is 0.1.

max_summary: This bar chart has 14 columns on the x axis representing Number of downloads, and Share of apps in each Number of downloads on the y axis.
The Share of apps is highest at Number of downloads 100-500 and lowest at Number of downloads 5000000+.
The highest Number of downloads 100-500 has 21.02 more Share of apps than the lowest Number of downloads 5000000+.
Share of apps at Number of downloads 100-500 is 21.12 , second place is 10-50 at 18.48, and thirdly is 1000-5000 at 14.11.
The average Share of apps in all 14 Number of downloadss is 7.14.
Summing up the values of all Number of downloadss, we get total 99.9.
